h4.TeleportGetNearestChildEntity (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_TeleportGetNearestChildEntity_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: sourceChar (Character struct)*
*Parameter 2: pchTag (string)*
gets the nearest created entity by searching through all entCreated and projectileCreated attribs to find those entities.


h4.TeleportGetNearestSiblingEntityWithPowerTag (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_TeleportGetNearestSiblingEntityWithPowerTag_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: sourceChar (Character struct)*
*Parameter 2: pchTag (string)*
gets the nearest sibling entity to the given entity by looking at the entity's creator and searching
through all entCreated and projectileCreated attribs to find those entities.
